page.title: 14Shopping in Swineshead
page.content: The village is very well blessed with visits of mobile shops coming in from surrounding towns and villages. There is a bread van that comes round on Monday, Wednesday and Friday it comes from Dean. If you you ring an order through you can get anything delivered from shoe laces to a joint of meat. Milk is delivered 3 days a week. 2 butchers and 2 fresh fishmen also visit and there is even a mobile shop to keep the village pets happy. The village is also visited by the mobile library on a fortnightly basis. There is a reasonable bus service from Bedford to Swineshead. Most days there is a morning and evening service, plus during the day other buses go through. There is also a bus that runs through Swineshead and onto St. Neots.
